channel.title: Build Berkeley APR with Open Jupyter Notebooks
channel.description: Last 10 notes on Build Berkeley APR with Open Jupyter Notebooks

item.title: about
item.description: Berkeley Housing Research This set of notebooks complement and support the City of Berkeley Housing Annual Progress Report, to be submitted in March, 2026, to CA Housing and Community Development per legal requirement.

item.title: A1: Data Sources Setup
item.description: A1: Data Sources Setup Workflow: Data Collection Level: Beginner Time: 30 minutes ðŸ“‹ Overview Sets up connections to Berkeley Open Data Portal and configures API access for downloading permit data.

item.title: Berkeley Housing Data Science Platform
item.description: Berkeley Housing Data Science Analyzing housing development and permits in Berkeley, California.

item.title: A2: Address Standardization
item.description: A2: Address Standardization Workflow: Data Collection Level: Intermediate Time: 45 minutes ðŸ“‹ Overview Cleans and standardizes messy address data from building permits to prepare for geocoding.

item.title: A3: Geocoding Pipeline
item.description: A3: Geocoding Pipeline Workflow: Data Collection Level: Intermediate Time: 30 minutes ðŸ“‹ Overview Converts Berkeley addresses to latitude/longitude coordinates using Alameda Countyâ€™s comprehensive address database.

item.title: B1: Lifecycle Tracking
item.description: B1: Lifecycle Tracking Workflow: Timeline Tracking Level: Intermediate Time: 45 minutes ðŸ“‹ Overview Tracks housing projects from initial proposal through completion, calculating timeline durations and identifying bottlenecks.

item.title: B2: Status Classification
item.description: B2: Status Classification Workflow: Timeline Tracking Level: Beginner Time: 30 minutes ðŸ“‹ Overview Standardizes inconsistent status descriptions from permit records into clean, analyzable categories.

item.title: B3: Progress Indicators
item.description: B3: Progress Indicators Workflow: Timeline Tracking Level: Advanced Time: 60 minutes ðŸ“‹ Overview Calculates quantitative progress metrics for housing projects and identifies stalled or delayed developments.

item.title: Jupyter Notebooks
item.description: Computational Notebooks Interactive Jupyter notebooks for Berkeley housing analysis.
